statements: SELECT * FROM GreenhouseGasEmissions;
SELECT source_name, emission_type FROM GreenhouseGasEmissions WHERE emission_amount > 1000;
SELECT source_id, source_name, emission_amount FROM GreenhouseGasEmissions ORDER BY emission_amount DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT measurement_unit FROM GreenhouseGasEmissions;
SELECT source_name, emission_type, emission_amount, measurement_unit FROM GreenhouseGasEmissions WHERE source_name LIKE 'Coal%' ORDER BY emission_amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM GreenhouseGasEmissions WHERE emission_amount > 1000
SELECT source_name, emission_amount FROM GreenhouseGasEmissions WHERE emission_type = 'CO2' ORDER BY emission_amount DESC
SELECT source_id, source_name, emission_amount, measurement_unit FROM GreenhouseGasEmissions WHERE emission_type = 'Methane' ORDER BY source_id ASC
SELECT AVG(emission_amount) AS average_emission FROM GreenhouseGasEmissions
SELECT source_name, SUM(emission_amount) AS total_emission FROM GreenhouseGasEmissions GROUP BY source_name HAVING total_emission > 5000
SELECT * FROM greenhouse_gas_sources;
SELECT source_name, location FROM greenhouse_gas_sources WHERE emissions > 1000;
SELECT * FROM emissions_records ORDER BY record_date DESC;
SELECT source_name, emissions FROM greenhouse_gas_sources WHERE location = 'Germany';
SELECT AVG(emissions) as average_emissions FROM greenhouse_gas_sources;
SELECT * FROM greenhouse_gas_sources WHERE emissions > 100 ORDER BY source_name ASC, location DESC
SELECT source_name, SUM(emissions) AS total_emissions FROM greenhouse_gas_sources GROUP BY source_name HAVING total_emissions > 500

SELECT * FROM greenhouse_gas_sources JOIN emissions_records ON greenhouse_gas_sources.source_id = emissions_records.source_id WHERE emissions_records.record_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY emissions_records.emissions_amount DESC
SELECT source_name, AVG(emissions) AS avg_emissions FROM greenhouse_gas_sources GROUP BY source_name ORDER BY avg_emissions DESC
SELECT source_name, location, SUM(emissions) AS total_emissions FROM greenhouse_gas_sources GROUP BY source_name, location HAVING total_emissions > 1000
SELECT * FROM greenhouse_sources;
SELECT source_name, emission_type FROM greenhouse_sources WHERE emission_type = 'CO2';
SELECT category_name, description FROM emission_categories WHERE category_id = 3;
SELECT source_name, emission_amount FROM greenhouse_sources ORDER BY emission_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM emission_records WHERE emission_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM greenhouse_sources;
SELECT source_name, emission_type, emission_amount FROM greenhouse_sources WHERE emission_type = 'CO2';
SELECT category_name, description FROM emission_categories WHERE category_name LIKE '%emission%';
SELECT s.source_name, c.category_name, e.emission_date FROM greenhouse_sources s JOIN emission_records e ON s.source_id = e.source_id JOIN emission_categories c ON e.category_id = c.category_id;
SELECT s.source_name, SUM(e.emission_amount) AS total_emission FROM greenhouse_sources s JOIN emission_records e ON s.source_id = e.source_id GROUP BY s.source_id;
SELECT * FROM GreenhouseGasEmissions
SELECT source_name, emission_type, emission_quantity FROM GreenhouseGasEmissions ORDER BY emission_quantity DESC
SELECT source_name, emission_type FROM GreenhouseGasEmissions WHERE emission_quantity > 1000
SELECT source_name, emission_quantity FROM GreenhouseGasEmissions WHERE emission_type = 'CO2'
SELECT source_name, emission_quantity FROM GreenhouseGasEmissions WHERE emission_quantity BETWEEN 500 AND 1000
SELECT * FROM GreenhouseGasEmissions ORDER BY emission_quantity DESC, source_name ASC;
SELECT source_name, emission_quantity FROM EmissionSources WHERE source_type = 'Industry' AND source_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT source_name, COUNT(report_id) AS report_count FROM EmissionReports GROUP BY source_id HAVING report_count > 5 ORDER BY report_count DESC;

SELECT e.source_name, c.category_name, r.report_date FROM EmissionReports r JOIN EmissionSources e ON r.source_id = e.source_id JOIN EmissionCategories c ON r.category_id = c.category_id WHERE r.report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT AVG(emission_quantity) AS avg_emission, MIN(emission_quantity) AS min_emission, MAX(emission_quantity) AS max_emission FROM GreenhouseGasEmissions;
SELECT * FROM Greenhouse_Gas_Emission_Sources;
SELECT source_name, emission_type FROM Greenhouse_Gas_Emission_Sources ORDER BY emission_type DESC;
SELECT source_name, emission_level FROM Greenhouse_Gas_Emission_Sources WHERE emission_level > 100 ORDER BY source_name ASC;
SELECT source_name, emission_level FROM Greenhouse_Gas_Emission_Sources WHERE emission_type = 'CO2';
SELECT e.report_date, e.total_emission, s.source_name FROM Emission_Reports e INNER JOIN Greenhouse_Gas_Emission_Sources s ON e.source_id = s.source_id;
SELECT * FROM Greenhouse_Gas_Emission_Sources;
SELECT source_name, emission_level FROM Greenhouse_Gas_Emission_Sources WHERE emission_type = 'CO2';
SELECT r.report_id, s.source_name, r.total_emission FROM Emission_Reports r JOIN Greenhouse_Gas_Emission_Sources s ON r.source_id = s.source_id;
SELECT c.category_name, COUNT(sc.source_id) AS number_of_sources FROM Emission_Categories c LEFT JOIN Source_Categories sc ON c.category_id = sc.category_id GROUP BY c.category_name;

SELECT eh.emission_date, eh.emission_amount, r.total_emission FROM Emission_History eh JOIN Emission_Reports r ON eh.report_id = r.report_id WHERE eh.emission_amount > 100 AND r.total_emission < 5000;
